title: As a chinese player, I just want to know why does Chinese version doesnâ€™t have the client for Mac.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/QmX7Zjh.jpg

I've had enough the speed of NA : (
By the way : I love this game.

replies.body:
Since Riot doesn't operate or support League in the Chinese servers and Tencent does, I'm unable to provide you with an answer, friend. You'll want to reach out to [**Tencent Support**](http://lol.qq.com/main.shtml) to inquire about this and any other questions you have about the region.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
